channel.title: Comments on: Enabling Zoom Integration in the UCSF Library Slack

item.title: By: Video Conferencing Options in Slack – Off the Shelf
item.dc:creator: Video Conferencing Options in Slack – Off the Shelf
item.description: […] there’s a help desk that can assist you. To start Zoom calls from Slack, you’ll need to enable the Slack integration yourself. Once you’ve done that, you can type /zoom in Slack to start a Zoom meeting. Use /zoom help to […]
item.content:encoded: […] there’s a help desk that can assist you. To start Zoom calls from Slack, you’ll need to enable the Slack integration yourself. Once you’ve done that, you can type /zoom in Slack to start a Zoom meeting. Use /zoom help to […]
